responses: Hey! I am here to listen you out. Please feel free to share everything with me. Everything is gonna be great in you life from now onwards! :)
No, You dont suck at everything. I believe in you! :)
I understand. Everything will be perfectly fine. Just recollect memories where you felt proud of yourselves. :)
Because god thinks that this is not right for you!! The more you will think about it the more you will lose yourself, hence Calm down and take a deep breathe. Everything is gonna be Nice soon!
